info.title: Warehouse Physical Stock by Product - Read, Update (A2X)
info.description: This allows you to analyze the current situation of physical stock in a warehouse. You can request stock information about products in a warehouse. Optionally, you can also read serial numbers. You can post unplanned goods issue for consumption and scrapping.

x-sap-shortText: Retrieve physical stock by product with this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Warehouse Ad Hoc Goods Issue(3BT)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3BT " Link To BP ")
[Warehouse Kanban Supply into Production(3VT)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3VT " Link To BP ")
[Standalone Warehousing – Ad Hoc Goods Issue(6VE)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6VE " Link To BP ")
[Standalone Warehousing – Advanced Production Integration(6W8)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6W8 " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
